channel.title: SoulX - PK 317 - Need staff!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/iw676ibhyebr4pa/anigif.gif[/img][/CENTER] [size=14pt]Welcome to Soulx Advertisement Thread[/size] click here to play -------> (Site currently down, coming soon) click here to download the client --------->[url=http://up.ht/14O2OzJ]http://up.ht/14O2OzJ[/url] Hey guys ! soulx started with the name outlawpkz we started to cde it me and my friend ! we worked hard we spent alot of days coding it ! and alot of people laughed at us ! but we belived that's we will have a good server and someday it will be one of the best servers! And guys plz join us and help us to grow and to make our Dream come ture! [b][size=18pt]Featurs:[/size][/b]
[ul][*]strong eco [*]custom starter(you can select what starter you want :skiller,pure,zerker,overall,etc..) [B][size=18pt]Shops:[/size][/B] [*]Donor shop [*]Vote shop [*]Pk shop [*]Dung shop [*]Pure pking shop [b][size=18pt]Bosses:[/size][/b] [*]Nex [*]Kbd [*]Dagnoth kings [*]Tormented demons [*]Corpal beast [*]and alot of bosees ! [*]Alot of minigames! [*]all skills working! [*]WE got awesome jail system you can't talk and pm in jail [*]we got awesmoe dung minigame! [*]Dupes Patched! [*]Helpful Staff! they active 24/7 [*]Nice owners! [*]Events every weekend ! like Double exp and dp and hide n seek[/ul]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/hiqduqt8n35dvk3/1.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/iffbi1fr91ytitk/2.png?m[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/dma304eq4czojxf/3.png?m [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/nalcnemd7li5d6c/4.png?m[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/bbngzol8g6j58qw/5.png?m[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/rk937a5hkha1orw/6.png?m[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/p7fghkh6clxo8m2/7.png?m[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/nejpcfw3pr94oam/8.png?m[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/6er0ft2i197woin/9.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/toqwqpn2v0t4yet/10.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/6pup54ikfdb3tlx/11.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/v2nk3oj92xobozj/12.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/x9fqr7xbk2gzcta/13.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/xn56fnm7pe7h4g1/14.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/sn9br45gfi71f7h/15.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ccn9vamtbrdk053/16.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ae41qx0sslxkktr/17.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/hi5jkjfbcvmw4tz/18.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/brfw9ky2vhrg008/19.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/1o460fszv7rmn3i/20.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ghs9b61mc22eoj8/21.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/1ysos30n5i6zs8e/22.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/0nwo28vlkq3nibm/23.png[/img]

Hey guys ! soulx started with the name outlawpkz we started to cde it me and my friend ! we worked hard we spent alot of days coding it ! and alot of people laughed at us ! but we belived that’s we will have a good server and someday it will be one of the best servers!
And guys plz join us and help us to grow and to make our Dream come ture!
